languages.text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and mark of corruption on the target for 1 round. If by the time the mark of corruption effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer 30-45 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and mark of corruption on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the mark of corruption effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and mark of corruption on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the mark of corruption effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

languages.text: Мощная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g}, которая на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} и метку скверны. Если по завершении действия метки скверны на цели сохраняется горение, цель получает <u>(от 30 до 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and mark of corruption on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the mark of corruption effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Мощная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g}, которая на 1 раунд накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} и метку скверны. Если по завершении действия метки скверны на цели сохраняется горение, цель получает <u>(от 30 до 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

Мощная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атака в ближнем бою{/g}, которая на 1 раунд накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} и метку скверны. Если по завершении действия метки скверны на цели сохраняется горение, цель получает <u>(от 30 до 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}と堕落のマークを加える強力な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}。堕落のマークの効果が終わるまでに、ターゲットにまだ燃焼の効果が残っていた場合、ターゲットは<u>30～45</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and mark of corruption on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the mark of corruption effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1ラウンドの間、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}と腐敗の印を加える強力な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}。腐敗の印の効果が終わるまでに、ターゲットにまだ炎上の効果が残っていた場合、ターゲットは30～45の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}と堕落のマークを加える強力な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}。堕落のマークの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が終わるまでに、ターゲットにまだ燃焼の効果が残っていた場合、ターゲットは<u>30～45</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: 发动威力强大的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与{g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}“腐化印记”{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。若{g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}“腐化印记”{/g}效果结束时，目标仍然处于燃烧状态，则会受到<u>30-45</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 发动威力强大的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与“腐化印记”效果，持续一轮。若“腐化印记”效果结束时，目标仍然处于燃烧状态，则会受到30-45点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

发动威力强大的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}与“腐化印记”效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。若“腐化印记”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}结束时，目标仍然处于燃烧状态，则会受到<u>30-45</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Un poderoso {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y marca de corrupción al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Si el objetivo aún tiene el efecto de quemadura cuando termina el efecto de {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}marca de corrupción{/g}, el objetivo sufre <u>(de 30 a 45)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un poderoso {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y marca de corrupción al objetivo durante 1 asalto. Si el objetivo aún tiene el efecto de quemadura cuando termina el efecto de marca de corrupción, el objetivo sufre 30-45 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.

languages.text: Ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, der beim Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}"Mal der Verderbnis"{/g} verursacht. Ist das Ziel am Ende des Effektes {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}"Mal der Verderbnis"{/g} immer noch mit "Verbrennen" belegt, erleidet es <u>(30 bis 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, der beim Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} und 1 Runde lang Mal der Verderbnis verursacht. Hat das Ziel zum Endzeitpunkt des Effekts Mal der Verderbnis immer noch den Verbrennen-Effekt, erleidet das Ziel 30-45 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Puissante {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}Marque de corruption{/g} à la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Si la cible est toujours frappée par l'effet Combustion lorsque l'effet {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}Marque de corruption{/g} prend fin, elle subit <u>(de 30 à 45)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Puissante {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} qui inflige les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} et Marque de Corruption à la cible pendant 1 round. Si la cible est toujours frappée par l'effet Combustion lorsque l'effet Marque de Corruption prend fin, elle subit 30 à 45 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.

languages.text: Hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} ve {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}yozluğun izine{/g} sebep olan güçlü bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}Yozluğun izi{/g} etkisi sona erdiğinde hedefteki yanma etkisi hâlâ devam ediyorsa hedef, <u>(30 ila 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: A powerful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If by the time the {g|f:0732d51a914b43d0bec50d9e82430f54}mark of corruption{/g} effect ends, and the target still has the burning effect on it, the target will suffer <u>(from 30 to 45)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
